Title: Pocahontas
Overview: Pocahontas, daughter of a Native American tribe chief, falls in love with an English soldier as colonists invade 17th century Virginia.
Tagline: An American legend comes to life.
Keywords: culture clash, settler, forbidden love, colony, musical, gold rush, princess, romance, native american, animation, virginia, star crossed lovers, reference to pizarro, jamestown virginia, pug dog, cross cultural relationship, musket, animate tree, indian chief, based on folk tale, 17th century, shamanism, songs, indians vs. settlers, animal sidekick, powhatan, land claim
production_companies: Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Feature Animation
Cast: Irene Bedard, Mel Gibson, David Ogden Stiers
